name: Intro
commands: Please, we need your aid, kind Sir.
I know this is hasty, but we need somewhere to shelter our friend.
We're already targetted by Monsdor, this won't help.
Monsdor is still after you? Villains...
Though seeing you here, so dishevelled...|Hardly villains.|Though, my heartstrings aren't really enough to get aid.
Please, sir...|Zio wanted to support us, but...|We haven't seen her around.
He's in kahoots with some weird people...|The monsters, he was involved, I'm sure!
We've also dealt with monsters, and Monsdor.
Seems we have a common foe.
He also locked us in a cell, until his son...
He locked you away...?|Nobody does that to my son, or you, Leap.
The King of Monsdor wants to take him to Aurelia, it seems.
Their pact...|So it wasn't purely their own volition?
I believe Grahment is collateral to get to us.|For Monsdor to display their strength, so Aurelia respects them.
We're just some kind of spectacle?!|Our people have suffered, given their lives up!
Oh, that's it!|Monsdor needs to learn a lesson!
Though your father will be unsafe in Aurelia, if we dawdle...
We'll need to divide our forces.
I know this is a lot to ask, but can you handle Monsdor?
Oh, trust me, I sure will try!
But how will we reach Aurelia quickly...?
We have several docks across the north.|I think you'll be able to seek passage.
I apologise for doubting Arcei...|Dean Essar, at your service.|This is my son and his partner, Leap.
I, as you folk know, am Prince Sages of Arcei!|With my retainers, Sal and Javi!
I'll have my best clerics treat your friend here, in the meantime.
It's so nice to meet you all!|But, I'm sorry we have to part so soon...
My good fellows, the game is afoot!
Lord Sages, if I might have a moment?
Well, I appreciate working with your squad, truly.|However, I believe it'd be best for me to fight alongside our Grahment acquaintances here.
Makes sense, Leap, you wanna take him?
Sure! We need all the help we can!
Thank you for your understanding...|Take care on your trip, Lord Sages.
